step_feedback.feedback: Good job placing your hands on your abdomen. Try to keep your whole body muscles tight during the inhale.
You're doing well sitting or standing comfortably. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Great effort on the inhale! Remember to visualize fluid moving to your chest as you breathe in.
Excellent job relaxing your muscles on the exhale. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out to aid drainage.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with this breathing exercise! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles as you inhale and relax them as you exhale. This helps your lymphatic system work better.
